entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
